text: We are proud to raise #BreastCancerAwareness this month, as #BreastCancer affects 1 in 8 #women in the #USA.  Join @drcaplan TOMORROW for a FREE webinar on current #cannabis research for #cancer treatment and an open forum for Q+A with attendees.🎗️  https://t.co/EpPI5S5Eo5 https://t.co/43WxOpQjSy
